spells.name: Blasphemy
spells.description: Kills, paralyzes, weakens, or dazes nonevil subjects.

spells.name: Dictum
spells.description: Kills, paralyzes, staggers, or deafens nonlawful targets.

spells.name: Holy Word
spells.description: Kills, paralyzes, blinds, or deafens nongood subjects.

spells.name: Refuge
spells.description: Alters item to transport its possessor to you.

spells.name: Regenerate
spells.description: Subject's severed limbs grow back, cures 4d8 damage +1/level (max +35).

spells.name: Restoration, Greater
spells.description: As restoration, plus restores all levels and ability scores.

spells.name: Scrying, Greater
spells.description: As scrying, but faster and longer.

spells.name: Summon Monster VII
spells.description: Summons extraplanar creature to fight for you.

spells.name: Word of Chaos
spells.description: Kills, confuses, stuns, or deafens nonchaotic subjects.
